question: Using an attribute selector, how would you select an `<a>` element with a 'title' attribute?
What is the line-height property primarily used for?

answer.choice1: to control the height of the space between two lines of content
answer.choice2: to control the height of the space between heading elements
answer.choice3: to control the height of the character size
answer.choice4: to control the width of the space between characters

question: Which is NOT true about class selectors?

answer.choice1: Multiple classes can be used within the same element.
answer.choice2: The same class can be used multiple times per page.
answer.choice3: Class selectors with a leading period
answer.choice4: Classes can be used multiple times per page but not within the same element.
